Name: Umbrella Escape
About the game: Every problem has a solution! The game Umbrella Escape is a casual game about a genius who follows Bond. The hero falls into the void along the way, encountering obstacles in his way, but his ingenuity makes him survive. Your mission is to get to the end avoiding all obstacles with the help of an umbrella. The umbrella is the only thing you have at hand to save yourself! Believe in yourself and good luck! Game Features : - Magical umbrella - Falling into the void - Mechanical watches - As you progress it will get harder
